issue.message: This call references a method added in API level 29; however, the containing class androidx.compose.ui.graphics.AndroidColorFilter_androidKt is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.

This call references a method added in API level 29; however, the containing class androidx.compose.ui.graphics.CanvasUtils is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.

This call references a method added in API level 29; however, the containing class androidx.compose.ui.graphics.CanvasUtils is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
